title: Developer experience as a KPI
summary: Measure and improve the time and friction it takes teams to deliver an integration from idea to production.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Modern platforms fail when they are hard to use; teams route around them and create sprawl.
whenNotToUse: Only a specialized team will use the platform

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Measure lead time, first-deploy time, and % using golden path; improve monthly.

complexity.toolingDemand: Telemetry on templates and pipeline usage.

realWorldExample.approach: Tracked onboarding time and standardized templates to reduce friction.
